snippet.title: Scriptorium: Master of Manuscripts | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to Steam wishlist! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3119540/

Welcome! It’s time to start your very own medieval manuscript workshop - the Scriptorium.

Create amazing medieval illustrations! Fulfil orders from prestigious patrons by making your own designs on pages of medieval books. Create, get paid, and unlock new orders, design elements, and grow your workshop. And with time and practice, your works and fame may reach the Queen herself!

The new game from Yaza Games - coming to PC Steam sometime in 2025! Other platforms TBA.

Trailer soundtrack created & composed by Aleksander Zabłocki - https://www.aleksanderzablocki.com
